content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to craft and position a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), but none succeeded because of inventory shortages and unresolved production dependencies. Although pre‐existing smelting facilities were utilized (an alternative furnace at (5.0, 5.0) for iron plate production and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0) for copper plate production), these were not built by the agent during these steps.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Consistency – When using get_entities, ensure the call conforms to its defined signature. Avoid unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) and confirm whether parameters should be positional or keyword to prevent unexpected argument errors.
• Placement and Iteration Checks – Before attempting to place an entity such as a Lab, verify that the item exists in inventory. Additionally, validate that any returned list from an API call is not None before iterating.
• Crafting Dependency Verification – For complex items like the Lab, ensure all prerequisite materials (for instance, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) can be produced. Establish that base production (such as smelting of iron and copper plates) is sufficient to support these multi-step recipes, and double-check ingredient counts before attempting a craft.
